projects.title: Miniature Painting Studio Website
projects.body: Website for Miniature Painting Studio including gallery connected with Firebase Firestore, Administration panel connected with Firebase Firestore, Authentication and Storage, and Blog implementation based on headless CMS. Responsive design with mobile-first approach built with Vue.js framework and Pinia state management.
projects.technologies: Vue.js, Pinia,  Firebase, Sass, JavaScript, CMS

projects.title: Anime DB
projects.body: Responsive Vue.js app using the Composition API, which integrates an Anime DB REST Api, also with implemented Firestore which allows user to create his list of anime.
projects.technologies: Vue.js, JavaScript, RESTAPI, Sass, Responsive Design, Firestore, Pinia
